Summary Of Changes And Bug Fixes For ZMap 0.1.134 [non-release build]

ZMap Changes/Fixes

Here's a list of what we've done to ZMap this month. Of course some of it depends on mods to Otterlace, so thanks to the Anacode team.

Bug fixes

RT Description Comment
SIRT:222354OTF results don't all show in Zmap; appear when Zmap restarted
SIRT:222457nc splice markers everywhere!
SIRT:220415, SIRT:220779 pipe server error gives no message
SIRT:222694,SIRT:222495 ZMap crash on startup

New features

RT Description Comment
SIRT:180043 Request BAM data via RC menu from mark As for Blixem BAM menu, but needs config
SIRT:180043 Include BAM datasets as required by Havana

Adam has provided a list of datasets from the encode dashboard

CIGAR in analysis pipeline similarity matches
new belvu
SIRT:222622 blixem starts coords improved
SIRT:223543 pipe scripts to use ENV not script_dir in next build of test otterlace not the first one

Acedb Changes/Fixes

!! SECTION MUST BE FILLED IN BY DEVELOPER !!


Seqtools Changes/Fixes

!! SECTION MUST BE FILLED IN BY DEVELOPER !!
